dataElements.name: subjectkey
dataElements.description: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject

dataElements.name: src_subject_id
dataElements.description: Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project

dataElements.name: origin_dataset_id
dataElements.description: Origin dataset Id

dataElements.name: interview_date
dataElements.description: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY

dataElements.name: interview_age
dataElements.description: Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
dataElements.notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

dataElements.name: sex
dataElements.description: Sex of the subject
dataElements.notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

dataElements.name: experiment_id
dataElements.description: ID for the Experiment/settings/run

dataElements.name: inputs
dataElements.description: Description of the inputs for the process

dataElements.name: img03_id
dataElements.description: Corresponds to row_id in image03 data structure, mapping derivative to source record in image03

dataElements.name: file_source
dataElements.description: File name/location

dataElements.name: job_name
dataElements.description: Identity of the run for pipeline processes

dataElements.name: proc_types
dataElements.description: Type of Process

dataElements.name: metric_files
dataElements.description: An archive of the files produced by the pipeline for metrics values

dataElements.name: pipeline
dataElements.description: Pipeline name

dataElements.name: pipeline_script
dataElements.description: File from pipeline used to derive output

dataElements.name: pipeline_tools
dataElements.description: Specific tools used in a pipeline (i.e., FreeSurfer, FSL, ANTs)

dataElements.name: pipeline_type
dataElements.description: Description of pipeline platform (i.e., LONI, NITRC-CE, NiPype)

dataElements.name: pipeline_version
dataElements.description: Version assigned to pipeline

dataElements.name: qc_fail_quest_reason
dataElements.description: Provide a reason that the image was determined to fail a quality control check or if the quality control check determined that the image was questionable

dataElements.name: qc_outcome
dataElements.description: Provide information on the conclusion of the quality control methods regarding the quality of the image

dataElements.name: derived_files
dataElements.description: An archive of the files produced by the pipeline

dataElements.name: scan_type
dataElements.description: Type of Scan
dataElements.valueRange: MR diffusion; fMRI; MR structural (MPRAGE); MR structural (T1); MR structural (PD); MR structural (FSPGR); MR structural (FISP); MR structural (T2); PET; ASL; microscopy; MR structural (PD, T2); MR structural (B0 map); MR structural (B1 map); single-shell DTI; multi-shell DTI; Field Map; X-Ray; static magnetic field B0; pCASL: ASL; MR: T2star; MR: FLAIR; Localizer scan; MR structural (FLASH); MR structural (MP2RAGE); MR structural (TSE); MR structural (T1, T2); 2D gradient echo; MR structural (MPnRAGE); Magnetic Resonance Spectroscopy(MRS)

dataElements.name: img03_id2
dataElements.description: Corresponds to row_id in image03 data structure, mapping derivative to source record in image03, number 2

dataElements.name: file_source2
dataElements.description: File name/location, 2

dataElements.name: session_det
dataElements.description: session details

dataElements.name: image_history
dataElements.description: Image history,f.e. transformations steps and other modifications.

dataElements.name: image_description
dataElements.description: Image description, i.e. DTI, fMRI, Fast SPGR, phantom, EEG, dynamic PET
